name: Roots: A short story about transportation through time
name_original: Roots: A short story about transportation through time
description:
Created over the weekend as a part of Global Game Jam 2023!

This is a simple game that tells the story of transportation. You play as root of the tree, that slowly digs underground to discover the "roots" of a town. Control are just the left mouse click (drag).

Game created by Maggie (@mmaggie@mastodon.world) and Callum (@calzila@mastodon.social)

Music created by Alyx Jones (@Alyx_Jones)
